revisionDesc.change: General - I agree that it would be best to write an introductory sentence that the partial, slightly fuller edition of the verso was added and encoded by Anne Boud'hors. Including of course the encoding provided by Boud'hors in her comment.

Vote - AcceptText - See Boud'hors' comments. The content of the verso is partially transcribed and described in the ed. which is complicated by the fact that not the whole image was pritned in the volume. I'd suggest to write an introductory remark that the verso's transcriptions has been done by Anne Boud'hors based on the description of the ed.pr.
